aka: Basri and Salma in a Never-ending Comedy
awards:
第76届戛纳电影节(2023)
　　主竞赛单元 短片金棕榈奖(提名) 科季·里扎尔
this_title: Basri & Salma dalam Komedi yang Terus Berputar
trans_title: 巴斯里和萨尔玛的无止境喜剧
Basri and Salma in a Never-ending Comedy
introduction: A husband and wife married for 5 years, own an Odong-Odong at the carnival together, spending their days entertaining and taking care of other people’s children without any of their own. Between meddling relatives, self-doubt and an explosive confrontation, they uncover why they have not been blessed with a child.
chinese_title: 巴斯里和萨尔玛的无止境喜剧
foreign_title: Basri & Salma dalam Komedi yang Terus Berputar
